Rank.Description: Increases your damage by 1%.
Increases your damage by 2%.
Increases your damage by 3%.
Increases your damage by 4%.
Increases your damage by 5%.
Reduces the cast time of your Plague Bolt by 0.1 seconds and the mana cost by 5%.
Reduces the cast time of your Plague Bolt by 0.2 seconds and the mana cost by 10%.
Reduces the cast time of your Plague Bolt by 0.3 seconds and the mana cost by 15%.
Reduces the cast time of your Plague Bolt by 0.4 seconds and the mana cost by 20%.
Reduces the cast time of your Plague Bolt by 0.5 seconds and the mana cost by 25%.
Increases the duration of your Necrosis by 2 seconds, increases its base damage by 30% and increases the benefit it receives from your Spell Power by 15%.
Increases the duration of your Necrosis by 4 seconds, increases its base damage by 60% and increases the benefit it receives from your Spell Power by 30%.
Increases the duration of your Necrosis by 6 seconds, increases its base damage by 90% and increases the benefit it receives from your Spell Power by 45%.
Increases your Spell Power by 1% and your pets Spell Power by 4%. Reduces damage taken by your defensive pets by 1%.
Increases your Spell Power by 2% and your pets Spell Power by 8%. Reduces damage taken by your defensive pets by 2%.
Increases your Spell Power by 3% and your pets Spell Power by 12%. Reduces damage taken by your defensive pets by 3%.
Increases your Spell Power by 4% and your pets Spell Power by 16%. Reduces damage taken by your defensive pets by 4%.
Increases your Spell Power by 5% and your pets Spell Power by 20%. Reduces damage taken by your defensive pets by 5%.

Ability.Description: Removes 1 Buff. Restores 5% of the Mage's mana.

Rank.Description: Consumption
Increases the healing you receive from Essence Link by 5%. Causes Essence Link to increase the damage taken by the affected enemy, from you and your pet, by 2%.
Increases the healing you receive from Essence Link by 10%. Causes Essence Link to increase the damage taken by the affected enemy, from you and your pet, by 4%.

Ability.Description: Deals 574 Death damage over 6s to up to 8 enemies in the target area. Damage to an enemy is increased by 10% for each stack of Deathly Calling.

Rank.Description: Grave Rot
You and your pet's attacks ignore 2% of your target's Armor and Resistances.
You and your pet's attacks ignore 4% of your target's Armor and Resistances.
Increases your Death damage by 2%.
Increases your Death damage by 4%.
Increases your Death damage by 6%.
Increases your Death damage by 8%.
Increases your Death damage by 10%.

Successful Critical Hits by your pet have a 33% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Plague Bolt or Crystalline Missiles, within 10 seconds, to 0, reduce its mana cost by 33% and reduce its global cooldown to 1 second.

Successful Critical Hits by your pet have a 66% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Plague Bolt or Crystalline Missiles, within 10 seconds, to 0, reduce its mana cost by 33% and reduce its global cooldown to 1 second.

Successful Critical Hits by your pet have a 100% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Plague Bolt or Crystalline Missiles, within 10 seconds, to 0, reduce its mana cost by 33% and reduce its global cooldown to 1 second.
Causes your Soul Purge to heal you for 15% of the damage done, in addition to its original effects.
Causes your Soul Purge to heal you for 30% of the damage done, in addition to its original effects.
Causes your Soul Purge to heal you for 45% of the damage done, in addition to its original effects.

Ability.Description: Summons a Greater Skeletal Zealot (max level 27). Best used for Melee Damage.
Summons a Greater Skeletal Knight (max level 27). Best used for Tanking.

Rank.Description: Grants the Summon: Greater Skeletal Zealot and Summon: Greater Skeletal Knight abilities. Reduces area effect damage done to your Undead pets by 65%, plus an additional 1% for every point spent in the Necromancer soul level above 21, to a maximum of 95%.

Ability.Description: Grants the appearance of death. Removes all threat. Temporarily despawns all pets.

Rank.Description: Feign Death
Increases the health of your pets by 10%.
Increases the health of your pets by 20%.
Increases the health of your pets by 30%.
Increases the health of your pets by 40%.
Increases the health of your pets by 50%.
Reduces damage done to your Skeletal Knight by 3%. Increases damage done by your Skeletal Zealot by 2%.
Reduces damage done to your Skeletal Knight by 6%. Increases damage done by your Skeletal Zealot by 4%.
Reduces damage done to your Skeletal Knight by 10%. Increases damage done by your Skeletal Zealot by 6%.

Gives your Shadow Revenant’s Ruination ability a 33% chance to deal an additional 100% damage and apply an additional stack of Deathly Calling, over 4 seconds, to each enemy hit. Increases the damage bonus of your Shadow Revenant’s Aid the Master ability by 3%. Increases your Shadow Revenant’s damage by 10%.

Gives your Shadow Revenant’s Ruination ability a 66% chance to deal an additional 100% damage and apply an additional stack of Deathly Calling, over 4 seconds, to each enemy hit. Increases the damage bonus of your Shadow Revenant’s Aid the Master ability by 6%. Increases your Shadow Revenant’s damage by 20%.

Gives your Shadow Revenant’s Ruination ability a 100% chance to deal an additional 100% damage and apply an additional stack of Deathly Calling, over 4 seconds, to each enemy hit. Increases the damage bonus of your Shadow Revenant’s Aid the Master ability by 9%. Increases your Shadow Revenant’s damage by 30%.
Empty the Crypts

Ability.Description: Transforms the Mage into a Lich. Increases mana regeneration by 20% and damage done by 10%. Grants underwater breathing. Increases the Mage's pet's damage done by 10%. Consumes Charge while active.

Rank.Description: Lich Form

Ability.Description: Deals 1258 to 1390 Death damage to the enemy. Damage to the enemy is increased an additional 15% per stack of Deathly Calling on the enemy.

Rank.Description: Your Corpse Explosion has a 50% chance to apply Corpse Explosion to all enemies it damages.
Your Corpse Explosion has a 100% chance to apply Corpse Explosion to all enemies it damages.
Your pet's Deathly Calling stacks increase your damage on the enemy by 1% per stack.
Your pet's Deathly Calling stacks increase your damage on the enemy by 2% per stack.
Reduces your pet's global cooldown to 1.25 seconds.
Reduces your pet's global cooldown to 1 second.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 50% chance to make your pet's next damaging ability critically hit.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 100% chance to make your pet's next damaging ability critically hit.

Ability.Description: Sacrifices 50% of the Mage's pet's Maximum Health. Gives the Mage a shield which absorbs up to 617 damage and renders them immune to control effects for up to 10s.
Converts all of the Mage's stacks of Deathly Calling on the enemy into stacks of Condemn dealing 606 Death damage over 16s per stack.

AbilityRank.Description: Increases your pet's damage by 30% for 15s. Consumes 50 Charge on cast.
